Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem Class Reference

class Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem
Evaluateur VDF pour la convection
Le champ convecte est scalaire (Champ_P0_VDF)
Schema de convection Centre
Rq:Les evaluateurs de flux convectifs calculent en fait le terme
convectif qui figure au second membre de l'equation d'evolution
c.a.d l'oppose du flux convectif More...

#include <Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h>

Detailed Description

class Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem
Evaluateur VDF pour la convection
Le champ convecte est scalaire (Champ_P0_VDF)
Schema de convection Centre
Rq:Les evaluateurs de flux convectifs calculent en fait le terme
convectif qui figure au second membre de l'equation d'evolution
c.a.d l'oppose du flux convectif

See also:
Eval_Conv_VDF

void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face ( int  face,
int  ,
const Periodique &  la_cl,
DoubleVect &  aii,

) const [inline]

Reimplemented from Eval_VDF_Elem.

Definition at line 1149 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References amont_amont(), Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Eval_VDF_Elem::inconnue, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, qcentre(), DoubleVect::size(), and Evaluateur_VDF::surface.

{
// Codage Periodique
// ALEX C.
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
  ArrOfDouble flux(aii.size());

// on applique le schema centre4
  qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs(),flux);
  if (psc > 0)
    for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
      aii(k) = -flux(k);
  else
    for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
      ajj(k) = -flux(k);
}

Definition at line 559 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, and Evaluateur_VDF::surface.

{
  int i = elem_(face,0);
// int j = elem(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (i != -1)
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        aii = -psc;
    }
  else   //!< n1 != -1
    {
      if (psc < 0)
        ajj = -psc;
    }
}

void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face ( int  face,
int  ,
const Periodique &  la_cl,
double &  aii,
double &  ajj 
) const [inline]

Reimplemented from Eval_VDF_Elem.

Definition at line 650 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References amont_amont(), Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Eval_VDF_Elem::inconnue, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, qcentre(), and Evaluateur_VDF::surface.

{
// 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
// ALEX C.

  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];

// on applique le schema centre4
  if (psc > 0)
// aii = -0.5*(transporte(i)+transporte(j));
    aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
  else
// ajj = -0.5*(transporte(i)+transporte(j));
    ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
}

Definition at line 1054 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, DoubleVect::size(), and Evaluateur_VDF::surface.

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
// int j = elem(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (i != -1)
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        for(k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
          aii(k) = -psc;
    }
  else   //!< n1 != -1
    {
      if (psc < 0)
        for(k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
          ajj(k) = -psc;
    }
}

void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_faces_interne ( int  face,
DoubleVect &  aii,
DoubleVect &  ajj 
) const [inline]

< on applique le schema amont

< on applique le schema centre4

Reimplemented from Eval_VDF_Elem.

Definition at line 1214 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References amont_amont(), Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Eval_VDF_Elem::inconnue, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, qcentre(), DoubleVect::size(), and Evaluateur_VDF::surface.

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
  ArrOfDouble flux(aii.size());

  if ( (i0_0 == -1) || (j1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont
    if (psc > 0)
      for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
        aii(k) = -psc;
    else
      for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
        ajj(k) = -psc;

  else  //!< on applique le schema centre4
    {
      qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs(),flux);
      if (psc > 0)
        for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
          aii(k) = -flux(k);
      else
        for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
          ajj(k) = -flux(k);
    }
}

) const [inline]

Definition at line 745 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References amont_amont(), Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Eval_VDF_Elem::inconnue, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, qcentre(), and Evaluateur_VDF::surface.

{
  int i = elem_(face,0);
  int j = elem_(face,1);
  int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];

  if ( (i0_0 == -1) || (j1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont
    if (psc > 0)
      aii = -psc;
    else
      ajj = -psc;

  else  //!< on applique le schema centre4
    if (psc > 0)
      aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
    else
      ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
}

< n1 != -1

Definition at line 532 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, Evaluateur_VDF::surface, and Neumann_sortie_libre::val_ext().

{
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  double flux;
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (n0 != -1)
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        flux= psc*inco[n0];
      else
        flux= psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
    }
  else   //!< n1 != -1
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        flux=psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
      else
        flux= psc*inco[n1];
    }
  return -flux;
}

{
// 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.

  double flux;
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);

// on applique le schema centre d'ordre 2

// flux = 0.5*(inco(n0)+inco(n1))*psc ;
// Ancien codage : on appelle le centre4
  flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);

  return -flux;

< n1 != -1

Definition at line 305 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, Evaluateur_VDF::surface, and Dirichlet::val_imp().

{
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  double flux;
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
  if (n0 != -1)
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        flux= psc*inco[n0];
      else
        flux= psc*T_imp;
    }
  else   //!< n1 != -1
    {
      if (psc>0)
        flux= psc*T_imp;
      else
        flux= psc*inco[n1];
    }
  return -flux;
}

  int n1 = elem_(face,1);

  if (n0 != -1)

      else

void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_faces_interne ( const DoubleTab &  inco,
int  face,
DoubleVect &  flux 
) const [inline]

< on applique le schema centre4

Definition at line 1184 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References amont_amont(), Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, qcentre(), DoubleVect::size(), and Evaluateur_VDF::surface.

{
  int k;
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);

  if ( (n0_0 == -1) || (n1_1 == -1) )
// Alexandre C. : 19/02/2003
// We do not use the first order upwind scheme as it was done before
// because in LES computations all turbulence is damped and we can not
// recover a proper behaviour of physical turbulent characteristics,
// especially when using wall-functions !
// Therefore we use the 2nd order centered scheme.
    for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
      flux(k) = -psc*(inco(n0,k)+inco(n1,k))/2.;
  else //!< on applique le schema centre4
    {
      qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco,flux);
      for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
        flux(k) *= -1;
    }
}
double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_faces_interne ( const DoubleTab &  inco,
int  face 
) const [inline]

< on applique le schema centre4

Definition at line 720 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References amont_amont(), Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, qcentre(), and Evaluateur_VDF::surface.

{
  double flux;
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  int n0 = elem_(face,0);
  int n1 = elem_(face,1);
  int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
  int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);

  if ( (n0_0 == -1) || (n1_1 == -1) )
// Alexandre C. : 19/02/2003
// We do not use the first order upwind scheme as it was done before
// because in LES computations all turbulence is damped and we can not
// recover a proper behaviour of physical turbulent characteristics,
// especially when using wall-functions.
// Therefore we use the 2nd order centered scheme.
    flux = psc*(inco(n0)+inco(n1))/2.;
  else  //!< on applique le schema centre4
    flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
  return -flux;
}
double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::qcentre ( const double &  psc,
const int  num0,
const int  num1,
const int  num0_0,
const int  num1_1,
const int  face,
const DoubleTab &  transporte 
) const [inline, protected]

Definition at line 1284 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References dist_elem(), and Evaluateur_VDF::orientation.

Referenced by coeffs_face(), coeffs_faces_interne(), flux_face(), and flux_faces_interne().

{

  double flux;
  int ori = orientation(face);

  double dx   = dist_elem(num0, num1, ori);
  double dxam = dist_elem(num0_0, num0, ori);
  double dxav = dist_elem(num1, num1_1, ori);


  double T0 = transporte[num0];
  double T0_0 = transporte[num0_0];
  double T1 = transporte[num1];
  double T1_1 = transporte[num1_1];


  double g1 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxav)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*(dx+dxam)*dxam);
  double g2 = (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxam*(dx+dxav));
  double g3 = (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxav*(dx+dxam));
  double g4 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxam)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*dxav*(dx+dxav));


  flux =  g1*T0_0+g2*T0+g3*T1+g4*T1_1;

  return flux*psc;
}
void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::qcentre ( const double &  psc,
const int  num0,
const int  num1,
const int  num0_0,
const int  num1_1,
const int  face,
const DoubleTab &  transporte,
ArrOfDouble &  flux 
) const [inline, protected]

Definition at line 1318 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References dist_elem(), Evaluateur_VDF::orientation, and ArrOfDouble::size_array().

{

  int k;
  int ncomp = flux.size_array();

  int ori = orientation(face);
  double dx   = dist_elem(num0, num1, ori);
  double dxam = dist_elem(num0_0, num0, ori);
  double dxav = dist_elem(num1, num1_1, ori);

  ArrOfDouble T0(ncomp);
  ArrOfDouble T0_0(ncomp);
  ArrOfDouble T1(ncomp);
  ArrOfDouble T1_1(ncomp);

  for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
    {
      T0(k) = transporte(num0,k);
      T0_0(k) = transporte(num0_0,k);
      T1(k) = transporte(num1,k);
      T1_1(k) = transporte(num1_1,k);
    }

  double g1 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxav)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*(dx+dxam)*dxam);
  double g2 =  (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxam*(dx+dxav));
  double g3 = (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxav*(dx+dxam));
  double g4 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxam)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*dxav*(dx+dxav));

  for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
    flux(k) =(  g1*T0_0(k) + g2*T0(k) + g3*T1(k) + g4*T1_1(k)  ) * psc ;
}

Reimplemented from Eval_VDF_Elem.

Definition at line 1078 of file Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem.h.

References Eval_Conv_VDF::dt_vitesse, Evaluateur_VDF::elem_, Evaluateur_VDF::porosite, DoubleVect::size(), Evaluateur_VDF::surface, and Neumann_sortie_libre::val_ext().

{
  int k;
  int i = elem_(face,0);
// int j = elem(face,1);
  double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
  if (i != -1)
    {
      if (psc < 0)
        for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
          flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
    }
  else   //!< j != -1
    {
      if (psc > 0)
        for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
          flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
    }
}
